entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, described as having known Dumbledore for a long time.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a great wizard and a close friend of Harry's, who has been placed under a Body-Bind Curse.

entities.name: crowd
entities.description: The crowd is mentioned as murmuring behind Harry.

relationships.description: Harry and Dumbledore are close friends, with Dumbledore being a great wizard and mentor to Harry.
Harry is kneeling on something hard, which he becomes aware of after looking down.
